briefTitle: Acute Effect of Chromatic Environment During Chemotherapy
officialTitle: Acute Effect of Chromatic Environment During Chemotherapy Sessions on Health Status and Pain
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

* Age 18-89 years
* Diagnosed with breast cancer that required chemotherapy
* Followed in outpatient clinic

Exclusion criteria:

* Diagnosed color blindness
* Undergoing treatment with antidepressants
